commands.command: npx graphql-codegen --config libs/backend-interfaces/codegen.yml && find libs/client-gql/src/lib/generated/ -type f -name "*.ts" -exec sed -i "s/Scalars/IScalars/g" {} + && ng lint client-gql --fix

npx ts-node -P ./tools/tsconfig.ts-tools.json ./tools/ts/update.ts --check --jsonUpgraded; npx ts-node -P ./tools/tsconfig.ts-tools.json ./tools/ts/update.ts --migrate=update; rm -rf migrations.json migrations-packages.json

npx ts-node -P ./tools/tsconfig.ts-tools.json ./tools/ts/update.ts --check --jsonUpgraded; npx ts-node -P ./tools/tsconfig.ts-tools.json ./tools/ts/update.ts --migrate=update --bulkUserChoice=true; rm -rf migrations.json migrations-packages.json
yarn install && yarn ngcc && npx ts-node -P ./tools/tsconfig.ts-tools.json ./tools/ts/update.ts --migrate=only; rm -rf migrations.json migrations-packages.json
